meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Teresa Lane Nina Kiekhaefer Tom Nissley Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6045.

td.p: Teresa Lane, a search engine optimization writer originally from St. Louis, Missouri
Nina Kiekhaefer, a family medicine physician from Jefferson City, Missouri
Tom Nissley, an online books editor from Seattle, Washington (whose 3-day cash winnings total $71,203)

tr.td: THE WINTER OF
MUSICAL LODGINGS
ONE OF THE 8 PLANETS
LIQUIDS
LOOK AT THAT IDIOM
SCOTLAND
